Posts.Content: TWow11967 wrote: Help! I wanted to see if there were others out there that were dealing with terrible acne during treatment. I also have a terrible rash on my chest and head. Any suggestions? I am on TC and have had 2 treatments so far. Thanks so much. Any advice would be so very helpful as this is so frustrating. Not having hair is one thing but then a terrible broken out face on top of not having hair makes me not want to go in public! Thanks so much for any help! Log in to post a reply
